Skills

Projects

Cursive Made Easy

Cursive Made Easy is an mobile application developed using Java in Android Studio. It was made as an educational tool to help teach cursive. It includes animations created in Adobe After Effects along with images created in Adobe Photoshop. An algorithm utilizing bitmaps to calculate pixel change was implemented to detect whether user traces followed proper procedure. It is currently available on the Android Play store and Amazon Marketplace.

Live Github

Disco DB

Discography Database is a web project developed with React. It allows users to search a band and returns their discography. Deezer's API was used for searching and fetching date. Styled components were used for the styling and Reactstrap was implemented to ensure responsiveness.

Live Github

Drink DB

As an ex-bartender, I know how difficult it can be to memorize different drinks. Drink DB is a full stack web application built using the Javascript frameworks and libraries. It includes a backend written using Node and Express along with MongoDB. The frontend was written using React.

Live Github
